pinyin: Heiméi liǔyīng shì yī zhǒng jìshēngxìng niǎolèi, chángcháng huì zài huángshàn děng shuǐshēng dòngwù de cháo zhōng shēng dàn.

en: curiosity killed the cat.
pinyin: hào qí hài sǐ māo

en: she silently endured everything.
pinyin: tā bǎ suǒ yǒu shì qíng dōu mò mò de rěn liǎo xià lái

en: he quietly left the world.
pinyin: tā mò mò de lí kāi le rén shì
